## Engine.attachScript() method

Attaches a script module to the given host, if enabled.

When disabled, this method resolves to `null` without side effects.

**Signature:**

```typescript
attachScript<T extends Host>(host: T, module: string): Promise<RuntimeScript<T>>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

host


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

Host object to attach the script to.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

module


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Module identifier to resolve and load.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[RuntimeScript](doc/markdown/./scene.runtimescript.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;

The `RuntimeScript<T>` instance, or `null` if disabled or on failure.
